brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to assess the level of knowledge of  surgery for women who
      underwent hysterectomy

clinical_study.brief_title: Pilot Study to Evaluate the Knowledge and Understanding on Surgery for Patients With Hysterectomy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Women who underwent hysterectomy at National Cancer Center, Korea

          -  Age > 20 years

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  The patients who refuse to participate or give consent to the procedure

study_pop.textblock: The patients who underwent hysterectomy at National Cancer Center, Korea

other_outcome.description: Satisfaction with Decision(SWD) will be used for decision of satisfaction with hysterectomy.
other_outcome.time_frame: No more than 5 years after hysterectomy

primary_outcome.description: The questionnaire of hysterectomy knowledge will be conducted by professional experts content validity review.
primary_outcome.time_frame: No more than 5 years after hysterectomy

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Decision Conflict Scale(DCS) will be used for decision of conflict with hysterectomy.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: No more than 5 years after hysterectomy

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case-Only, Time Perspective: Prospective
